page.title: 05 The Misbourne School
page.content: They have moved into the computer age and have 14 computers in the school. Pupils travel from a radius of 10 miles,and the staff come from places like Aylesbury,London and Reading to get to the school. About ten people go to University each year, and many go on to colleges.Pupils go to all sorts of jobs,mostly in offices or factories. The outings organised include two ski holidays in France and Italy,a tennis holiday and a summer activity school each year. The sports available for girls include tennis,rounders and netball,while the boys play rugby and football. Many activities are run for the community like films and playschools, and summer schools during August.
